nodes.text: Nuna Turkey Jerky, also known simply as nuna jerky, was a food made from the meat of a nuna. The jerky sold at Ronto Roasters in Black Spire Outpost could be spicy or sweet. During the High Republic Era, Padawan Imri Cantaros shared his packets of nuna jerky with Avon Starros when they were stranded on Wevo. As Starros hated their only other food option, joppa stew, she was grateful for the jerky despite disliking it.
Nuna Turkey Jerky has previously been sold in both spicy and sweet varieties at the real world version of Ronto Roasters in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. Its listing can be seen on archived menus.
